mapper.insert: insert into dynamics(user_id, push_time, push_content, push_image) values(#{userId},#{pushTime},#{pushContent},#{pushImg})
insert into dynamics(user_id, push_time, push_content, forward_id, type) values(#{userId},#{pushTime},#{pushContent}, #{forwardId}, #{type})
mapper.select: select d.id,u.user_nickname nickName,u.user_email userEmail,d.push_content pushContent,d.push_time pushTime,d.push_image pushImage,d.zan_num zanNum,d.forward_id forwardId,d.type dtype,d.forward_num forwardNum from dynamics d,user u where u.id = d.user_id
